ping.description: Checks the latency between the bot and Discord

say.description: Performs TTS for whatever you enter
args: [text] - The text to say in voice

bit.description: Joins the voice channel you are in and plays a BitLuni meme

sendbit.description: Sends an audo clip of BitLuni in the text channel the command is ran in

image.description: Sends a random image of BitLuni doing something stupid
